Privacy Policy

This policy only applies to the products and services of eyeexam APP. We understand the importance of personal information to you and will do our best to protect the security of your personal information. Please read and confirm this Privacy Policy carefully before registering. This privacy policy covers how we collect, use, store, publicly disclose, process and protect your information when using eyeexamAPP products and services. Posted by: Beijing Jinhui Shengshi Mobile Technology Co., Ltd.

1. Collection and use of your personal information

2. How we protect your personal information

3. Your rights

4. How to update this policy

5. How to contact us

How we collect and use your personal information

Personal information refers to various information recorded electronically or in other ways that can identify a specific natural person alone or in combination with other information or reflect the activities of a specific natural person. We will only collect and use your personal information for the following purposes described in this policy.

(1) Your personal information that we may collect during the service process

1. Register and log in

1.1 When you use eyeexamAPP, you can use our services without registering and your personal information will not be collected.

Browse and use

2.1 Use of services: Users can enjoy our services without logging in or registering.

2.2 Browsing service: In order to ensure that you can browse and use basic services such as browsing information and checking market conditions well without logging in, we may collect device information such as IMEI number. In order to ensure that services such as market quotes can be better displayed, we may request external storage permissions from you (to store market data).

2. How we store, share and publicly disclose your personal information (1) Storage Personal information collected and generated by our company within the territory of the People's Republic of China will be stored within the territory of the People's Republic of China. (2) Sharing We will not share your undesensitized personal information with any company, organization or individual outside our company. Exceptions include: 1. After obtaining your explicit consent or authorization, our company will share your personal information elsewhere; 2. Our company may provide it in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations, mandatory administrative or judicial requirements. (3) Public disclosure In principle, we will not publicly disclose your personal information, except in the following circumstances: 1. According to your request, disclose the personal information you specify in the disclosure method you explicitly agree or authorize; 2. When it is necessary to provide your personal information in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, mandatory administrative law enforcement or judicial requirements, we may, based on the type of personal information required and the method of disclosure, and as permitted by laws and regulations, adopt measures that comply with the requirements. Your personal information will be publicly disclosed under industry standard security measures. 3. How we protect your personal information Our company has used security protection measures that comply with industry standards to protect the personal information you provide to prevent data from unauthorized access, public disclosure, damage, modification, loss or loss. Please understand that the Internet is not an absolutely secure environment. Please use complex passwords to help our company ensure the security of your account.

4. Your rights In accordance with relevant laws, regulations and regulatory provisions, our company guarantees that you can exercise the following rights with respect to your personal information: (1) Access, correct and update your personal information You have the right to access, correct, and update your personal information through the mobile APP, unless otherwise provided by laws and regulations. You are responsible for promptly updating your personal information. (2) Delete your personal information In the following situations, you can make a request to our company to delete personal information: 1. If our company’s handling of personal information violates laws and regulations; 2. If our company uses your personal information without your consent; 3. If our company's handling of personal information violates the agreement with you. 5. How to update this policy According to changes in national laws and regulations and service operation needs, our company will modify this policy and related rules from time to time. The modified content will be announced through the mobile APP and replace the previous relevant content. You should pay attention to relevant announcements, prompt information, changes in agreements, rules and other related content from time to time. You understand and confirm that if you do not agree with the updated content, you should immediately stop using the service and cancel the relevant account. Our company will stop collecting your relevant personal information; if you continue to use the service, you will be deemed to have agreed to accept the changed content.

.

6. How to contact our company If you have any questions, comments or suggestions about this privacy policy, please contact our customer service hotline: 18501253329 Please read this Privacy Policy carefully before agreeing to make sure you understand the meaning of its contents. Your agreement and completion of registration is deemed to be your acceptance of this Privacy Policy. Our company will legally use and protect your personal information in accordance with relevant laws, regulations and this policy. Update date: May 23, 2024 。
